website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 is a compact megazoom camera that is capable of taking some excellent photos, just at a leisurely pace, but at a good price.
pros: capable of snapping photos with excellent quality

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small camera
customer_reviews.text: 14.1 MP and palm size means this camera works really well to take some decent pictures. However, most phones perform this well today. If you want more zoom, than you'll need a better camera. Maybe a good starting point for your children.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Bought this after my expensive Lumix went belly up with the lens error a lot of new digital cameras seem to have. Decent photos, easy to get to my computer. It does have a slooowww lag time on the shutter button. And does not come with a case. It does have a multi use type cord with it that can be used to attach to pc via usb and also has video cable I guess to attach to tv etc. Battery charge is not nearly as long as my Lumix had, but hey, don't have to buy batteries either.
customer_reviews.author: L. Treat

customer_reviews.title: Very poor photo quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a point-and-shoot traveller who wanted a small camera for travels to Asia. My old Nikon Coolpix 7600 had some sticky buttons, so I thought I'd upgrade to this Sony. The photo quality from this camera is so poor compared side by side to my Nikon; even from photos printed 6 years ago. The only thing I like on this camera is the panorama mode. I don't know enough about cameras to explain why this Sony takes such horrible photos on Auto or Easy mode, but if you're a novice shooter like me, don't get this camera. I'll be buying another (and cheaper) coolpix next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ole camera
customer_reviews.text: Manufacture warning shows when use the memory adapter. Working as expected. Fit the need.
customer_reviews.author: T2

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1MP
customer_reviews.text: I am fond of taking pictures. Not a big time photographer but when ever go for an outing then its always obvious that i will be incharge of camera. I bought this camera for a good deal and its the best one that i got for such a price. Its look is awesome. The pictures that it takes is so clear and perfect. I just love this camera. Nothing that i can complain about this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Pawan

customer_reviews.title: and I liked the quality of the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because a relative had a Sony camera, and I liked the quality of the pictures. This camera is compact, easy to use, and full of features. It does a great job for both stills and movies. I still have it 4 years later, and never have had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Benz

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-H55
customer_reviews.text: A repeat customer . . . I dropped this camera out of a locker (5 feet up) on a concrete floor when I was in Costa Rica and it quit working. I liked it so much I went and bought another one just like it. Can't ask for a better recommendation than that.
customer_reviews.author: SAD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, durable product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it a for a trip back east (my other digital camera passed away!) That was six years ago, lol. It's still going strong! Awesome, durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I carry this camera everywhere. I love the panoramic feature. The resolution is great. Many have downgraded this due to low level light capabilities, but I found it very adequate. The only thing I do not like about this, is the extreme slowness to turn on and off. Sony could have done better there..
customer_reviews.author: NCretiree

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality...impressed with very first few pictures
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research for buying a decent camera and decided to buy H55. It had great reviews and it has lived up to its expectations. I was a little skeptical using it the first time but was pleasantly surprised to see such a fine quality of pictures. I read about one issue in other reviews and I agree with it...the pictures doesn't look as good on the computer as they are on the camera LCD screen. I don't understand why...may be there is a mismatch between the pixels of camera LCD and computer LCD. I guess I'll need to try reducing the pixels on camera and then compare the quality..overall I'm satisfied by this camera...worth my money...
customer_reviews.author: Rajendra Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just completely satisfied with this product! The Intelligent Auto is amazing and very convenient! You get quite a few manual options (for a non-professional camera) and the zoom is the BEST I've ever seen in any point-and-shoot camera! The casing isn't the best (plastic and I get a little scared the battery lid will break sometimes but this is because you get what you pay for. The camera is VERY CHEAP for what it does. I'm sure it'll work just fine for you if you take care of it. Highly recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: grawp

customer_reviews.title: DSCH55
customer_reviews.text: This camera for it's size takes excellent pictures, the zoom is terrific, and the best part is the in camera trimming feature. Good battery life and easy to use menus, another great Sony Product. I have had many Sony digital cameras and all have been excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hankland

customer_reviews.title: and it worked like new. I carry it with me all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding still and video camera and tough too. I accidentally washed it in the washing machine, let it dry out for a week, and it worked like new. I carry it with me all the time in my pocket and use it for interviewing people. Good zoom. Wish the video didn't shut off at 30 minutes requiring you to push the start button again. Liked this camera so much I bought a second one as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves his new camera!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift Santa tossed in my hubby's stocking! Pro photographer nephew recommended this as the best camera for the money and he was right. Great pic quality, easy to use in a variety of shots and inexpensive compared to others with this many pixels.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: imagine my joy when I found this refurbished one for 48 bucks ...
customer_reviews.text: can't find these in the store anymore, discontinued. imagine my joy when I found this refurbished one for 48 bucks on amazon.com. and it works great. 14 megapixels and 10x zoom. Takes awesome clear quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: First of all for $225 and free shipping this camera awesome for the price. I'm thinking that i should of went with a lower megapixel camera, to me if it makes any sense to anyone that it might be to detailed that the picture looks fake, might be a good thing. In a low lit room its not the greatest even with the flash, sometimes i find myself covering the flash with my fingers because of the placement of the flash. Great features. The only draw back is that the camera does not come with Carl Zeiss lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Chanson S. Sim

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Camera
customer_reviews.text: This truly is the best camera I have ever owned. I have bought probably 10 cameras on Amazon. I am not a professional by any means but I love photography. This camera is truly amazing. The pictures are crisp, clear and the colors are brilliant. I literally bobbed the camera as I walked and took pictures at a car show. Every single picture came out perfect. I have nothing bad to say about this camera. It reigns supreme.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Cyber-shot
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great camera for someone who is wanting a quality picture without so much bulk to their camera! I love it and I love taking it on trips with me to capture some great moments. There is a lot of settings that you can adjust to get the perfect lighting shot. I wouldn't recommend this camera to someone who is not very technology smart. It is a more complicated camera so you can not just snap a photo and get the perfect picture; you have to adjust the exposure.
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl2012

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera to take Pics on Day Light.
customer_reviews.text: The Resolution of the images is great, and the video is also excellent. But when you use the camera with the Flash at Night, it can be a little obnoxious, You have to wait at least 2 or 3 seconds for the flash to operate and for the camera to stabilize the image, and even you can get a blurry or moved image. But Still a good camera. =)
customer_reviews.author: R. F. Galea

customer_reviews.title: Does It All
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, a distinct notch above typical point and shoot cameras. Insane good battery life and file space with 8G card. I really only use auto-mode and it works very well. This model is proven and still up to date two years after purchase. Very impressive hi-def video with surprising audio through the pin-hole mic. We taped Adelle at 140 meters in the dark and the results were amazing. I am an experienced shooter but not a serious photography buff; for me this Sony does everything I could ask for. Minor caveats: Zoom during videos may corrupt audio. No intermediate resolution between VGA and 5M. Video is MP4 only.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Brock

customer_reviews.title: Good features, but still slow
customer_reviews.text: I've just recently bought this camera before a 3-week vacation trip, and my impressions are based on that trip. Camera has a number of good features, namely an x10 zoom, 3" LCD screen, panoramic picture taking, and what I liked the most - a very impressive image stabilization system. Battery life is decent - 2 or 3 days of rather intensive picture taking. Negatives include a somewhat bigger package (not sure anything smaller can have an x10 zoom), and a very slow interface. Operating zoom is a challenge, as it is obviously micro-controller operated, and sometimes is busy with something else, when you are trying to frame the picture. Turning the camera off is also excruciatingly slow.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: like the features
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to take on a trip to Germany. He made good use of it. I like the features, especially panorama mode
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Rizzuto

customer_reviews.title: You'll be satisfied with this one.
customer_reviews.text: Great pocket camera. Good stills, good video. When I have the $$ I'll upgrade to the latest Sony pocket camera.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Scheiner

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera but-----
customer_reviews.text: I really love the ease of this camera. I just traveled to Spain, Prague, Austria and Germany. Now I would like to download my pictures to my laptop. How do I do this? I only have the yellow, red, white, cable that came when I ordered this from Amazon. Help!!! What do I need to buy in order to hook up this camera to my laptop???
customer_reviews.author: lynn21

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures in bright light. Almost no delay, crisp colors, great pics. My only complaints - when you zoom in more than about 5x (the camera goes to 10x), the pictures get a little blurry. Same thing happens in low light. There is a pretty significant delay and the pictures often come out a little fuzzy. Otherwise, I've been really happy with it so far. It seems pretty comparable to the Canon Powershot A1100 that I switched from.
customer_reviews.author: mjtytrin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: The best Camera I have bought up to today! (april 2015)
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product....fit every need of mine and came when scheduled. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Amazing zoom
customer_reviews.text: A terrific camera. It is very compact but has a fabulous optical zoom that captures fine detail in low light from substantial distances. Settings are as simple or as detailed as the user wants. Would prefer AA batteries to lithium, but these recharge easily and stay charged for a long time. This is the first camera I have bought that lacks a direct viewfinder, but the screen is visible even in bright sunlight. Overall, I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Axolotl82

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased three of these. It's a great combination of 14 MP, 10X lens and size! The only thing I'd have changed is the flimsy door for the battery and memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i currently have this product for 3 years and orderring a second one for my uncle who is looking for one like mines
customer_reviews.author: Kalvin

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Wide Angle...
customer_reviews.text: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Wide Angle...was a gift to another person. there are so many options for getting a sony cyber shot that to the non-technical and not tech literate it is difficult to decide on and buy. as it was so difficult we did not follow up and get the sony digital video camera as that is really too complicated for us as we are first time buyers; options are not explained well. So we are not buying any more sony photography gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Goods than Bad - Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It has been 2 months since I owned this camera. I am impressed with the feature set that comes with the camera, especially the 3" LCD screen, 10x wide angle zoom, Panorama/HD video features and the semi-manual controls. It's easier to quote just the drawbacks: Size is a little big (that's because of 10x zoom), Slow interface response, Battery life is okay but not great, Low light pictures are just fair and could be better. I give it a 4 star rating considering the few cons listed above. It is definitely a good value for the money and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for such a great all around camera, if your not looking into a SLR this is a super camera, everything is adjustable in one setting for a more advanced user or just shoot away and not worry about anything. Video recording is top notch great quality, suggest at least a 8gb memory stick duo HGpro which will get you about 110 minutes of HD video
customer_reviews.author: DaDDEEoOH

customer_reviews.title: Worth for money
customer_reviews.text: No special reasons..bought this for my younger who is in early teens and going to start photography. Good one to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram Balasubramaniyam

customer_reviews.title: Out Standing Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera does everything a professional camera will do. The pictures are amazing and the videos are breathtaking! It is small and very easy to use in all modes. I highly recommend this to anyone at any level of need. !
customer_reviews.author: JLCM

customer_reviews.title: H55 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd H55 Camera.I love this little & light piece.I rate myself a little more than a beginner. Previously I have CanonA620.That Camera is also good but that needs AA bateries & I hate that.I like H55 being a chargble batery.Technical photo features of this camera is worth of its price being a 10X zoom, panorama & other features.I have yet to completely explore it but my experiance by now is good.
customer_reviews.author: mohan vashisth

customer_reviews.title: super picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera. I love to have it. Outstanding light capturing mechanism. Very handy and even a small kid can capture very good pics.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera at low low cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera with a lot of new features at a low low cost. It is said to be used, but looks like factory rejects because of minor scratches on the LCD viewing screen. Everything looks like new except for a minor scratch on the LCD viewing screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gopalakrishna M. Elluru

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has an excellent Optical 10X zoom, images are crisp, clear and the colors are brilliant. Video looks great when played in my laptop. Nice panoramic photos. I recommed this camera to anyone who is looking for shooting great quality indoor/outdoor pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos P. da COSTA

customer_reviews.title: and great optical specs
customer_reviews.text: The digital camera with everything.....small, automatic, movies, photos, panoramics, and great optical specs....
customer_reviews.author: J. Holtaway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: Have had the camera for a few days, and so far, works wonderfully. Despite what others say, the image is captured quite quickly for most shots.
customer_reviews.author: Stpgirlie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera and still loving it.. it takes awesome photos and the zoom is very nice... I personally like it very much and got one for my dad as well
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Love the camera, very little to complain about
customer_reviews.text: This camera is pretty awesome. The quality of pictures is Superior to anything in this price range. We did however have to send it back because the shutter would not open and shut all the way without help. This bothered me and I sent it back. Other than that, camera is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MGLC

customer_reviews.title: camera review
customer_reviews.text: Loves this camera. It is all it says and more. Very easy to use!! The picture is quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: dku

customer_reviews.title: good camera!!
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves this camera.the pictures that I have taken with this camera have turned out really well.this camera also has great zoom capibilty.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas long

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. I'm a Realtor & the wide angle field pulls in most of a room without giving it a fish eye look.
customer_reviews.author: WJW222

customer_reviews.title: Nice Images!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has an excellent Optical 10X zoom, images can be seen clearly and with rich colours. Also using the 20X digital zoom photos have many details, you can apreciate like lines in a wall or symbols in a stone. 720p video looks great when played in my laptop and it does not have blur or moving lines like in other camera's brands, thanks for the mp4 format, very, very portable. Nice panoramic photos, I use them as wallpapers. Only one thing I couldn't do with this camera was shooting the moon or filming it, may be I have to read the manual with more calm. SD Cards supported, nice move!
customer_reviews.author: Everything´s Possible

customer_reviews.title: Solid build and features for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good choice for someone who needs a simple, hi-res point and shoot. I've been getting good results in our dimply lit house with the intelligent auto settings. Remember to order a memory card and a case!
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: great camera. great zoom. easy to use. clear pic. i would recommend this camera for anyone. Sony cameras never disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely not a photographer, but I think this is a really good camera. I did a lot of research on point and shoot cameras and this one was the best for the money.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong camera so I cancelled the order.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: because of it,s quality of picture i love it was a great experience u must buy it and enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: mohammad awais

customer_reviews.title: Great and incredible Digital Camera from Sony.
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive and heavier than W380 with same 14 MP. Its 3" LCD is a plus. So is the panoramic picture taking routine that takes the drudgery out of stitching individual panels. The SDHC memory card slot is more popular than the memory stick duo which often requires an adaptor to read. The DSC-H55s 10x wide (25mm equivalent) lens takes better shots from greater distances and wider landscapes in a compact body. Take breathtaking panoramic shots. I love this camera!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Gonzalez Landaeta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this camera, it has the option of intelligent auto adjustment, which is very usefull to take pictures quickly and for people over 40 like me, who can't see without lenses is suitable. The 3.0 inch LCD is fantastic. This camera takes pictures quicklier than previous Sony cameras I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Mora

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my honeymoon and couldn't be happier. I was looking for a good point and shoot camera that shot well in day and nighttime settings. This camera does it all... Would definitely recommend...
customer_reviews.author: colorado mike

customer_reviews.title: Graet camera
customer_reviews.text: We knew we wanted that model because of its features. Have used it on two family vacations already. Very compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Grizal Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that I bought this camera because it takes great pictures and the relation between quality and price is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Really bad camera
customer_reviews.text: Only good time I spent with this camera was first 3 months. After that faced many issues with the hardware. First ccd and then motherboard went kaaboom. now service center is asking me money more than the cost of this camera..
customer_reviews.author: Sujay

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a couple days. Now wont turn on. Battery is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1MP
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1MP Digital Camera is a very decent point and shoot camera. I have a DSLR camera but I bought this so I can easily carry around a camera for the times I don't have the DSLR with me. This is the second Sony point and shoot camera I have bought through the years and it works really good!.
customer_reviews.author: Bluedues

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and is easy to use. You must remove the battery to charge it, that is the only drawback I have noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Western Bank Wolf Pt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera for the everyday user.
customer_reviews.text: Sony had come along ways with their camera, I purchased this camera just before going to my daughters graduation. I also upgraded from my older 6mp Sony P&S camera. I'm not an expert photographer, but this camera suites 99% of my needs. the movies in HD are just great, as wells as the telephoto lens. I would recomend this camera because it just about has everything and still fits in your shirt pocket, which means you are like to have it when you want it most. Unlike a SLR
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This cam has really awesome features --especially the panaroma sweep! its amazing product! I have ordered it to India all the way from amazon.com after revewing the product throughly. I already possess a sony cybersot older model which is nice & slim. But his h55 model clearly outweighs the kind of features, picture quality and zoom it has! the only good thing would have been if the cam was ultra-slim like the older cybershot models!
customer_reviews.author: reveiwer

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, the sharpness of the pictures is unbelievable, and the zoom is great. It takes great video's and it adjusts the camera to the picture your taking. This is a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Joannie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best product I have ever purchased. Also I was surprised after seeing that it is a product of Japan.
customer_reviews.author: kas

customer_reviews.title: Super Simple
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few point-and-shoot camera's I've seen that holds true to its name. Never had a camera that took better pictures, in as many different light conditions as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: The camera is very nice indeed, a very good price for the money
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very nice indeed, a very good price for the money. it takes both pictures and you can also make movies. A great gift to give for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: The best. Number one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best camera and video combination I've ever purchased!!! I did purchased the Samsung dual touch screen but I returned it the next day due lot of noise in the picture and is not simple to operate. I also purchased the Fine pix with 10x zoom but also with a lot of noise in the picture when I downloaded it at the PC. This is the best camera for a 10x zoom. I could have bought the HX5V Sony model but too expensive for me. I found no flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: pocket size with lots of features or easy mode if you don't want to mess with everything manually. i love it. even better with SD compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: sir

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Best purchase ever. It's exactly what I was looking for. I totally recommend this item. HIGH QUALITY AND GOOD PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: wxmr2212

customer_reviews.title: Sony Digital Camera DSC-H55
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. I love the features, image stabilization, 3 inch LCD, 14.1 MP, 10x wide angle optical zoom and smile dection to name a few. The most important thig is this camera takes great pictures and is small and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Work
customer_reviews.text: Good job, excellent working group, satisfied with the purchase and delivery time ... not hesitate to recommend and return to work with PCs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moya

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for this price
customer_reviews.text: The camera makes high quality pictures no matter the conditions. You can choose between several options (automatic, inteligent automatic, manual, etc.) depending the experience you have with cameras. This is the best camera with 14 MPix resolution and 10x optical zoom for its price. It has good design and variety of features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heat camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 24 year old son whe is in the photo industry. He loves it. Good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L. Cranmer

customer_reviews.title: good camera in this price range
customer_reviews.text: a good camera in this price range .. day pics r great, zoom is good, low light pics not that good...
customer_reviews.author: Vaibhav Kumar

customer_reviews.title: dsch55 best camera for your money
customer_reviews.text: i have had cameras before this one but this is so far the best camera i got. i recomend it
customer_reviews.author: elvis

customer_reviews.title: Good point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Thou its a good speedy point and shoot its not the fastest but it does have great picture quality in daytime lighting situations. The night time shots could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-H55
customer_reviews.text: This is really amazing product from Sony, bought it after lots of R&D, picture quality is amazing and even the videos are of HD quality....really amazing camera any fresher can user this camera, just point and shoot....i am loving it...i bought 2 one for myself and the other for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Khade

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera!
customer_reviews.text: A friend say to me. Why you buy a Sony Camera the Cannon are better! in this moment a take a picture in sweet panorama and finally he saw d=the difference between Sony and Canon.The quality when you use the zoom is magnificent, honestly I LOVE THIS CAMERA and the seller by on time.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera - Value for money
customer_reviews.text: I own this camera for a while now, and I must say that I don't have to repent on my decision. Its great value for money. It takes great pictures in well lit conditions, for little darker places, it is average. It gives me fair bit of manual controls, which is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Tarun

customer_reviews.title: great camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Only thing it does not have is a sound recorder. Takes really great pictures, lots of great features at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: It is just I need
customer_reviews.text: This is really amazing product from Sony, picture quality is amazing and even the videos are of HD quality
customer_reviews.author: Sofi

customer_reviews.title: Good compact camera with 10x zoom that works!
customer_reviews.text: Always have used Sony compact cameras, and this is the best one yet. Especially for the price, the camera has numerous features which I won't repeat here, but they all seem to work as advertised. Good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camera so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this camera has done pretty good. The only complaint I have is that if the subject moves at all while taking the pic it seems to always blur.
customer_reviews.author: MsMischa

customer_reviews.title: Simple and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase... it's small and i got high quality pictures with a very good zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Philipe Kupferman

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: For the price its an excellent Camera. I am satisfied. SONY hardly ever lets me down.
customer_reviews.author: Junaid Bhatti

customer_reviews.title: dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am sure I got a lemon, the pictures are so grainy it makes me wonder if it is a 14.1 mp. I had high expectation, I am very disappointed...

customer_reviews.author: Ramu

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of cameras and stuck with Sony for the 4th time. It is hard to review a camera better than a single star since the camera would continually come up with re-insert memory card. In just a couple weeks of use and a few different memory cards I missed some great pictures of my kids. It looked like a great camera but I cant risk losing photo ops! Back to drawing board. I wish it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scian

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H55 14.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Wide Angle Optical Zoom with SteadyShot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
feature_bullets: 10x optical zoom Sony G-Lens (25mm-equivalent wide angle); Capture breathtaking images in Sweep Panorama Mode
HD Movie mode (720p); take stable movies while walking in Active Mode
iAuto automatically optimizes camera settings; Smile Shutter technology automatically captures a smile
Card slot for optional Memory Stick Duo media and SD media
